translation: Good afternoon, everyone!
transcript: 好，大家下午好！

translation: My presentation today has two parts.
transcript: 我这次介绍呢主要介绍两个内容。

translation: The first is a general introduction of Baidu Open AI Platform.
transcript: 第一，是整体地介绍一下我们百度AI的开放平台。

translation: The second is about our recently-launched Baidu AI Ecosystem Partner Program.
transcript: 第二，我是再给大家解读一下我们前不久刚刚发布的，百度AI生态伙伴计划。

translation: As we know, Baidu launched its business by developping search engine, and we have spent more than a decade in the R&D of AI.
transcript: 众所周知，百度从做搜索引擎开始，在人工智能的研究和发展上大概有十几年的时间了，

translation: Our comprehensive layout of AI technologies started to take shape around seven or eight years ago with our efforts on NLP, voice technology, machine learning, image technology, etc.
transcript: 而全面地布局AI技术呢，是差不多七八年前从NLP、语音、机器学习、图像等开始的，对。

translation: Now, We have a complete layout of AI technologies.
transcript: 时至今日，我们已经形成了一个最完整的AI技术布局。

translation: Based on the layout, we unveiled the strategies of Baidu's open AI ecosystem at Baidu Create in July.
transcript: 好，在此基础之上，我们在今年七月的AI开发者大会上，发布了百度AI开放生态战略。

translation: As a complete ecosystem, it includes two parts, the cloud and the terminals.
transcript: 这个完整的生态应该包括云和端两个部分。

translation: Baidu Cloud is a colossal computing platform.
transcript: 智能云，是很很大的一个计算平台。

translation: It is available not only within Baidu, but also to our developers and partners as a basic support platform.
transcript: 它不仅提供百度内部使用，而且还提供给我们的开发者和合作伙伴，成为基础的支撑平台。

translation: Baidu Brain, backed by Baidu Cloud, offers various AI-infused capabilities and is the core of Baidu's AI.
transcript: 在这之上的百度大脑，它蕴含了各个各种AI的能力，是百度AI的源泉。

translation: Above the brain is vertical solutions and ecosystems, such as DuerOS.
transcript: 再之上，是垂直的解决方案和行业生态，比如DuerOS。

translation: Based on voice technology and NLP, DuerOS is a next-generation natural language-based human-computer interaction OS, aiming at industries such as smart home.
transcript: DuerOS是基于语音和NLP，就是自然自然语言的下一代人机交互的操作系统，主要面向的可能是泛家居这种行业。

translation: Next is Apollo.
transcript: 然后阿波罗，

translation: Apollo, an open platfom for smart driving technologies and elements, aims at the automotive industry.
transcript: 阿波罗是开放了智能驾驶相关的所有的技术和元素，主要面向的是汽车这个行业。

translation: The whole strategy features two key words: one is openness, and the other is ecosystem.
transcript: 然后，整整观这个整个战略，有两两个核心词：一个是开放，一个是生态。

translation: We expect to achieve a strategic goal by opening up every layer and building them jointly with our partners.
transcript: 我们希望把每一层都开放出去，和合作伙伴共建，达成这个战略目标。

translation: Now I will briefly introduce Baidu Brain.
transcript: 好，下面我给大家大体介绍一下百度大脑。

translation: Baidu Brain is the technological layout of Baidu AI technologies.
transcript: 百度大脑，就是百度人工智能的这个技术布局。

translation: The basic layer incorporates data, algorithm and computing platform.
transcript: 基础层包括：数据、算法、计算平台，

translation: It is essential to Baidu Brain.
transcript: 它是整个的一个基础。

translation: What is perception layer?
transcript: 感知层，感知层是什么呢？

translation: Take human for example. The perception layer is to Baidu Brain what the visual and auditory perception are to us.
transcript: 感知层，如果拿人来举例子，就是我们的听觉能力、视觉能力，

translation: These abilities allow us to directly perceive the outside world.
transcript: 这些是我们直接在外感知世界的这么一个能力，对。

translation: The other layer features cognition, which is an ability unique to human.
transcript: 认知层是人类区别于其他生物独有的一个特质，

translation: It includes linguistic competence, the abilities of understanding, digesting, summarizing, and applying knowledge, and the ability of understanding one another.
transcript: 包括语言的能力，对知识的提炼、理解、沉淀、运用能力，以及对人的理解的能力，对吧。

translation: On top of these is the Open AI Platform, which is the source of all AI-infused functions.
transcript: 在这之上呢，是AI开放平台，它是所有AI能力的源泉，

translation: It unfolds all the functions from the layers below.
transcript: 把下面的所有的能力对外统统地暴露出去，对。

translation: With Baidu Brain, we hope to shape a virtuous eco-circle by jointly building a technological platform with partners from all industries.
transcript: 然后在这基础之上，我们希望和各行各业的合作伙伴一起共建技术的平台，形成这种良性的循环生态。

translation: We hope that innovative applications could flourish in this ecosystem, which could benefit us all with AI-infused capabilites.
transcript: 再从而能够在这个生态上长出各种各样的创新的应用，来真正的把AI让它普惠到社会上的每一个人。

translation: OK, next I will talk about Baidu Open AI Platform in detail.
transcript: 好，下面我详细地说一下这个百度AI开放平台。

translation: Up to now, this platform has opened more than 80 capabilites.
transcript: 在这个平台之上，目前，我们已经开放了八十多项能力，

translation: Some can be directly used, some are going through public or private beta testing, and others will be made available in the near future.
transcript: 有可以直接使用的，也也有正在邀测和公测的，还有近期即将开放的。

translation: Theses functions can be classified into three layers.
transcript: 纵观整个能力，主要分为三层。

translation: The first is the framework layer, which is PaddlePaddle, an deep learning platform developed by Baidu.
transcript: 首先是计算框架层，也就是我们百度自主研发的深度学习平台 PaddlePaddle。

translation: PaddlePaddle is now a open-source platform.
transcript: 我们把这个PaddlePaddle完成了开源，

translation: It is the fundamental framework and the source of the development of all capabilites.
transcript: 它是所有打造所有能力的一个框架、一个源泉。

translation: Then there are scenario-based machine learning capabilites.
transcript: 在这之上是场景化的能力。

translation: PaddlePaddle is the most comprehensive AI platform. It incorporates various capabilites, such as voice, OCR, face and body recognition, image moderation, video, natural language understanding, knowledge mapping, AR, data management, etc.
transcript: 非常非常多，包括语音方面的，OCR方面的，人脸、人体识别方面的，图像审核方面的，图像识别方面的，视频方面的，自然语言理解方面，知识图谱，AR，数据管理，非常非常全面，可以说是人工智能领域最全面的一个平台。

translation: I believe that PaddlePaddle is the most comprehensive platform countrywide, even worldwide.
transcript: 包括国内或国外，我觉得没有我们是最全面的平台，没有之一。

translation: Above PaddlePaddle is our solution layer.
transcript: 在这之上，是我们的解决方案层。

translation: The solution layer is not only an integration of all capabilites, but also a program that has been thoroughly optimized based on every scenario.
transcript: 解决方案层不仅是各项能力的综合，而且是我们基于每一个场景，深度打磨的这么一个方案，

translation: It can be used by our developers and partners.
transcript: 能够很方便地供我们的开发者和合作伙伴使用。

translation: Now I will briefly introduce the capabilities on each layer. First of all, PaddlePaddle.
transcript: 好，下面我会分层对各个层面的能力进行一个概要的介绍，首先是PaddlePaddle。

translation: The goal of PaddlePaddle is to become the deep learning platform that meets best the need of developers in China.
transcript: PaddlePaddle的目标就是做最符合中国开发者需要的深度学习平台。

translation: First, it understands best Chinese. Why?
transcript: 首先，它最懂中文处理，为什么？

translation: Because it is deeply rooted in China and benefits from the profound experience that Baidu has acquired in processing Chinese for over a decade.
transcript: 因为它深耕于中国的业务，而且凭借百度这十几年在中文处理方面的深厚的积累，

translation: Now PaddlePaddle makes it available in the form of source code.
transcript: 把这些积累以源码的形式开放出去。

translation: Second, it satisfies best the needs of Chinese enterprises.
transcript: 其次，它最符合中国企业的需要。

translation: We know that data is the means of production of AI, and data security may be what most Chinese companies are concerned about.
transcript: 我们知道，数据是人工智能的生产资料，而数据安全是每一个可能是大部分中国企业比较关注的。

translation: Our PaddlePaddle offers standalone deployment and distributed deployment to help companies secure their data.
transcript: 而我们的PaddlePaddle能够提供单机的私有化部署，或者是多机的分布式的部署，完全可以部署到企业中，来确保数据的安全。

translation: Third, it suits Chinese developers best, because it was developed by Chinese developers, right?
transcript: 第三，它是最符合中国开发者的，因为它就是中国开发者开发出来的，对吧？

translation: Only what's unique to a nation can be precious to the world.
transcript: 就是只有先作为民族的才能走向才是世界的。

translation: While constantly opening up various technologies and source code, we also developed deep learning curriculum according to the current technological context, so as to help our developers and engineers make more progress.
transcript: 好，不断开放了技术和源码，我们还针对这个现在人工智能的时代开发了深深度学习的课程，来辅助我们的开发者和工程师成长。

translation: We know that AI is another major opportunity for developers in the way the past era of mobile devices rallied a large group of Android and IOS engineers.
transcript: 我们知道，人工智能是开发者的又一大机遇，就像当年的移动时代，安卓工程师、IOS工程师一样，

translation: Our own curriculum, along with those we developed together with Jike Xuyuan(literally translate to 'Geek Acadamy'), intends to help our developers and engineers become AI engineers.
transcript: 我们自己开发的课程，包括和极客学院一起打造的课程，来助力我们的开发者和工程师成长为人工智能的工程师。

translation: Then let’s talk about facial recognition technology.
transcript: 好，下面是人脸技术。

translation: Our facial recognition offers not only basic capabilities such as face and body recognition, face liveness detection, face comparison, face search, etc., but also solutions optimized based on region scenarios.
transcript: 我们人脸技术不仅开放了人体人脸检测、活体检测、人脸对比、人脸查找等基础能力，而且，还开放了地域场景打磨的我们的解决方案。

translation: These solutions include AFR-enabled ID verificaton, AFR-enabled sign-in, which you have seen when you came in, membership verification through face recognition that you saw in the promo video, and the auto-gate solution enabled by face recognition.
transcript: 比如人脸核身的解决方案，比如会场签到的解决方案，就像刚才大家进来时候这个签到用的那个一整套的方案，再有就是人脸会员识别的解决方案，刚才宣传片上大家应该也已经看到了，再有就是人脸闸机的解决方案。

translation: Wu Yanyu, one of my co-workers, will give you a more detailed introduction later of these solutions and basic capabilities, so I won’t go into details here.
transcript: 这些方案和基础能力，一会儿我的同事吴延宇会做一个详细的介绍，我在这里就不详细地展开了。

translation: In short, we made face technology available with the goal to make every face recognizable.
transcript: 总之，我们开放人脸技术的目的就是让天下没有难看的脸。

translation: Next, our advanced text recognition.
transcript: 下面是领先的文字识别。

translation: It is fair to say that Baidu's text recognition may be the most advanced technology in the industry, way ahead of its competitors.
transcript: 可以说百度的文字识别是全领域最领先的，最呃大大领先于竞品。

translation: And text recognition consists of several capabilites.
transcript: 而文字识别又有几个能力。

translation: First, the capability of general text recognition.
transcript: 首先是通用文字识别的能力，

translation: The second is card recognition, including ID cards, bank cards, driving licenses, vehicle licenses, etc.
transcript: 再一个就是卡证识别，包括身份证、银行卡、驾照、行驶证等等等等这些卡证类，

translation: Third, web image recognition, which entails the recognition of wordart.
transcript: 再有一个就是网络图片的识别，就是这种各个艺术字啊等等，

translation: The fourth is the table and form recognition, which can adequately recognize and reproduce structured data in scanned copies.
transcript: 还有就是表格文字识别，就像我们表格的这种扫描件，它都能很好地进行识别和还原成这个结构化的数据，

translation: It also be used in receipt recognition.
transcript: 呃再有就是票据识别等等。

translation: Well, let's take an example.
transcript: 我们来看，举个例子。

translation: First,  common typefaces can be well recognized by line.
transcript: 首先，对于这种正常的印刷体，我们能够很好地逐行地去识别。

translation: And wordart and distorted characters in web images, can also be properly recognized.
transcript: 再有，就是这种含有艺术字的网络图片，还有异形的这种网络图片上的文字我们都能进行一个很好的识别，而且效果非常好。

translation: Moreover, information on tickets and receipts can be identified by line with perfect accuracy.
transcript: 再有，就是票据，我们也能逐行给它识别出来，效果可以说是完美。

translation: In addition to these general capabilities, we will also open the customized OCR templates in the near future, because we not only have to identify the characters correctly, but also reproduce the fields as you wish.
transcript: 除了这些通用的能力，那我们近期还会开放个性化模板的OCR，因为我们不仅要识别出正确的字，而且要返回你关心的字段。

translation: For example, here we have a medical bill.
transcript: 比如，举个例子，这是一张医疗的票据。

translation: The first one is a template customized by the user.
transcript: 第一张是用户自定义的模板，

translation: After the user defines the fields and values ​that he or she wants to use, we upload a new medical bill.
transcript: 他关心哪些字段和哪些值，定义好之后我们上传一张新的医疗票据，

translation: The one in the middle was taken and uploaded by a mobile phone.
transcript: 中间那张就是用手机拍摄上传的。

translation: We use AI-infused algorithms and image transformation to extract the subject we want to identify.
transcript: 我们用一些人工智能的算法、图像变换，给它截取出我们待识别的主体，

translation: Meanwhile, we identify the fields that the user wants to use, restructure and return them to a document.
transcript: 同时，我们识别出来它关心的字段，并且给它结构化到文档中返回，

translation: In this way, we can meet specific needs of many developers and partners.
transcript: 这样可以解决很多开发者和合作伙伴个性化的这种需求。

translation: Then there are all the capabilities of image recognition and image moderation, including subject detection.
transcript: 最下面，再下面就是最全面的图像识别和图像审核的技术，

translation: It covers over a million tourist attractions, products and medicines.
transcript: 包括图像主体检测，覆盖了百万种以上的这个景点、商品、药品。

translation: Common object identification can be used in almost a thousand scenarios.
transcript: 通用的物体识别也能识别近千上千种的场景，

translation: It can categorize objects and detect subjects, etc.
transcript: 进行物体分类，主体检测等。

translation: As for the brand logo recognition, we cover more than 20,000 logo, and this logo library can be built by users themselves.
transcript: 品牌LOGO识别，我们覆盖两万多个LOGO，而且这个LOGO库是可以就是自己建立的。

translation: As for plant identification, we can identify more than 20,000 kinds of plants and more than 8,000 kinds of flowers;
transcript: 植物识别，我们能识别两万多种植物，而且八八千多种花卉；

translation: As for animal identification, we can identify thousands of animals;
transcript: 动物识别，我们能识别数千种的动物；

translation: As for food identification, we can identify more than 50,000 kinds of foods and return their calories at the same time.
transcript: 菜品识别，我们能识别五万多种菜品，同时返回它的卡路里。

translation: Next we have vehicle model identification and vehicle damage identification.
transcript: 下面还有车型识别和车辆定损识别，

translation: We can detect more than 3,000 vehicle models and damaged parts.
transcript: 我们能检测大约三千多种以上的车型和受损部件。

translation: As for image moderation, we have opened the capabilities to identify pornography, terrorism, politically sensitive contents, advertisements, sick photos and image quality assessment, etc.
transcript: 图像审核，我们开放了色情识别、暴恐识别、政治敏感识别、广告检测、恶心图像识别、图像质量检测等等能力。

translation: This helps our moderators censor the content generated by UGC with greatly improved efficiency.
transcript: 这个为现在我们的审核人员，呃还有UGC产生的这个内容提供审核，会大大提高审核的这个效率。

translation: Let's look at an example.
transcript: 好，我们下面看一个例子，

translation: It is a video about vehicle damage assessment.
transcript: 播一下视频，车辆定损视频。

translation: This is an application developed to assess vehicle damage.
transcript: 车辆定损识别，这是一个开发者的应用。

translation: It involves vehicle model identification and vehicle damage assessment.
transcript: 它集成了一个车型识别和车辆定损识别，

translation: By taking a picture of the whole vehicle and then full-shot, mid-shot and close-shot pictures, we can assess the damage of the vehicle according to its model and damaged parts.
transcript: 只需要拍一个车的整车的这个图片，再拍一个远景、中景、和近景，我们就能根据车型识别和受损部件的识别，返回这个车具体的哪个部位受损了。

translation: Don’t move!
transcript: 别动！

translation: We can see that the bumper, fender and headlight are damaged.
transcript: 我们可以看到保险杠、叶子板、大灯受损了。

translation: Okay.
transcript: 好！

translation: Well, AI identified that the damaged parts are the bumper, fender and headlight, perfectly consistent with what had happened.
transcript: 好，AI识别出前保、叶子板和大灯三处受损，与现场完全吻合。

translation: Okay.
transcript: 嗯好。

translation: In addition to the common capabilities of image recognition mentioned above, we also have a customized training platform.
transcript: 除了以上的通用的图像的能力，我们还有定制化的训练平台。

translation: What are its advantages?
transcript: 这个平台的优势是什么？

translation: You don’t have to be an expert in image or image recognition to use it.
transcript: 您不需要懂图像和图像识别相关的专业知识，

translation: Instead, it can automatically train itself and manage the models.
transcript: 它就能自动化地训练和进行模型的管理。

translation: For example, this is one of our project and it is about Chinese herbal medicine.
transcript: 比如，这是我们的一个示例，就是药材。

translation: You can feed it data of the medicine and it will then train itself.
transcript: 把所有的药材的数据扔进去，然后进行自主的训练，

translation: Taking this one for example, we can see that according to its estimation, the medicine is highly likely to be a salvia, and it is ineed.
transcript: 最后再拿一个药材，比如说这是一个药材，再输入进去，就能给一个预测的结果，我们可以看到它预测丹参的这个概率非常得高，它就是一个丹参。

translation: Based on this platform, we have also worked with a partner and developed an application to identify th genuineness of Chinese herbal medicine, such as Rhodiola rosea.
transcript: 而且基于这个平台，我们和某个合作伙伴，一起开发了这个这个中草药的真伪与鉴定，很能很清楚地鉴别出真的红景天和假的红景天。

translation: After proper training, the platform can verify the genuineness of Chinese herbal medicine, which is impossible to an untrained eye, with an accuracy rate higher than 95% without human intervention.
transcript: 在非专业人士无法辨别真伪的药材上，经过训练，不需要人工干预的情况下，真伪鉴定准确率能够达到95%以上。

translation: Next, let's talk about the reverse image search platform, including the search of similar and identical images.
transcript: 接下来，是以图搜图的这个平台，包括相似图和相同图的搜索。

translation: This is very helpful in retail when users are searching for or sharing the picture of a commodity with one another.
transcript: 这个在这个零售的领域，是非常非常有帮助的，比如我们进行商品的一个检索、推荐等等。

translation: Specifically, as for searching for identical images, the platform can find the original or identical images whether or not they have been trimmed or scaled, as in the case of the first one.
transcript: 具体的呢，比如，相同图的搜索，我们不论是图像是经过剪裁过还是缩放过，我们都能给找到相同它原始的或者是相同的图片，就像第一个。

translation: Second, even the image's resolution is low, the platform can also find images with higher resolution.
transcript: 第二个呢，就是在低分辨率的情况下，我们也能找到高分辨率的图片。

translation: Third, the platform can find the subject even if the background is different.
transcript: 第三，在背景不同的情况下，我们依然能找到这个主体。

translation: Fourth, when the subject is too small, the platform can still find identical subjects, which is the search of identical images.
transcript: 第四，在主体过小的情况下，我们依然能搜索到和它相同的主体，这是相同图搜索。

translation: Then as for the search of similar images, let's look at an example.
transcript: 然后相似图搜索，我们一起来看个例子。

translation: This is the search of identical images.
transcript: 这是相同图搜索，

translation: If you want to buy a product but don't know how to describe it or don't know its brand, you just need to take a photo.
transcript: 假如你在外边看好了一个商品，又不知道怎么去描述，或者不知道它的品牌，这时候你只需要拍一张照片，

translation: This capability has been fully integrated into our Baidu App, you can just take a photo and start search, and it will show you similar or identical products, then you can make your real-time purchase decision.
transcript: 这个能力已经完全集成到我们的手百里面了，对，拍一个照片，搜索，就会出现这种跟它这个商品类似的或者是相同的这个商品，你就可以实时地去弄呃你的决购买决策了。

translation: This is very helpful to the retail industry.
transcript: 这对于我们的零售行业是非常非常有帮助的。

translation: The next is a powerful intelligent video processing technology.
transcript: 好，接下来就是强大的智能视频处理技术。

translation: There are several aspects, and one of them is video content analysis.
transcript: 有有几个方面，一个是视频内容的分析，

translation: What is video content?
transcript: 什么是数视频内容？

translation: It includes people, text, sounds, and scenes at any particular time in the video.
transcript: 就是一个视频，我们能够把它哪个时间出现了什么人，出现了什么字，出现了什么声音，这是一个什么场景，

translation: We can use the technology to analyze these elements and then output them in a structured form.
transcript: 都给它分析出来，并且结构化地输出。

translation: Another is the selection of video thumbnail.
transcript: 再一个就是视频封面视频封面选图。

translation: As we know, for a video, the selection of thumbnail is crucial for its clicks.
transcript: 大家都知道，对于一个视频来讲，封面选得好不好，对于这个视频的点击量是至关重要的。

translation: We can increase the clicks of a video by selecting the best image according to our understanding of the video.
transcript: 我们通过对视频的理解，能选择最精彩的一张图作为它的封面，来提高这个视频的点击量。

translation: Also, we can search for videos with reference, which means  we can search for videos through image, and longer videos through a short video, or conduct data deduplication in a video.
transcript: 再有就是视频对比检测，我们可以一是可以用图来搜视频、用短视频搜长视频、或者是进行视频的去重。

translation: The popularization of live streaming has brought huge pressure on video content moderation because any violation might lead to the shutdown of a company.
transcript: 还有就是现在直播领域非常非常得火，视频内容审核面临不小的压力，说不定你哪天就被关停了。

translation: Now, with video content moderation we can screen out any forbidden content.
transcript: 而具有了这项能力，利用视频内容审核的能力，可以确保这个呃网络环境的干净。

translation: I'll give you two examples.
transcript: 下面我举两个事例，

translation: First, let's look at a case of video content analysis.
transcript: 先看视频内容分析的事例。

translation: This is a clip of a film.
transcript: 这是一个影视片的一个片段，

translation: We can see that by using Baidu’s video content analysis, we know what the scene is, whose faces appear at which time, what text in the scene appears at which time, what sound is made at which time.
transcript: 我们可以看到，利用百度这个视频分内容分析，我们知道这个场景是什么，然后在几分几秒出现了哪些人的人脸；再一个，在什么时间出现了这个文字，这个场景里面有文字；还有就是在什么时间这里边出现了什么声音，发了什么声音，

translation: So this is a very comprehensive system of video analysis.
transcript: 这是非常全面的一个视频的分析的系统，好。

translation: By using this ability, we can convert all of our life experiences into structured data as long as we record them.
transcript: 我们可以想象，如果利用这个能力，我们在生活中经历了一切，只要被记录下啊完全都可以被结构化，对吧？

translation: It means that it will be more and more difficult for wrongdoers to commit crimes in the future, and our world will become increasingly safer.
transcript: 就是可以这么说，以后要做一些坏事，就变得越来越难了，而我们的环境，会越来越安全。

translation: So if you want to do anything bad, hurry up when you still can. Just kidding!
transcript: 所以说如果你现在还有什么事情没有干，那就抓紧干，以后相对会困难很多。

translation: The next one is an example of video content moderation.
transcript: 再下一个是内视频内容审核的示例。

translation: This is also a demo of video content moderation we made based on a film clip.
transcript: 这也是基于视频内容审核和一个影片我们做的一个demo。

translation: Play it again, please.
transcript: 再放一遍，麻烦再放一遍。

translation: When the content is normal, this box is green;
transcript: 当正常的时候，这个框是绿色的；

translation: When there is adult content in the video, this box turns yellow.
transcript: 当出现性感内容的时候，这个框是黄色的，

translation: If there is pornography, sorry, it will be edited out!
transcript: 一旦出现色情内容，对不起！

translation: OK.
transcript: OK。

translation: We also have made voice technology available.
transcript: 还有，我们的语音的开放技术。

translation: It mainly has three aspects: voice recognition, voice synthesis, and voice wake-up.
transcript: 语音包括三个方面，一个是语音识别、语音合成、语音唤醒。

translation: Voice recognition encompasses near-field ones and far-field ones, including whispers, long speech, etc.
transcript: 而语音识别，又分为近场和远场，包括耳语、长语音等等。

translation: And now this capability has greatly surpassed human's own ability to recognize voice.
transcript: 而且现在我们开放的这个能力已经大大领先于人自身具备的这个语音识别的能力。

translation: My co-worker Kang Yongguo will give you a comprehensive introduction of voice technology later, so I'll give you just one example of voice recognition.
transcript: 之后，语音方面，我的同事康永国会给大家做一个全方位的介绍，我们只看一些语音识别的一个例子。

translation: Let's listen to a voice message, and tell me what it says.
transcript: 比如我们来听一段语音，大家可以告诉我这个语音说的是什么。

translation: You said “Legend of White Snake”. What is it?
transcript: “新白娘子传奇”，这什么？

translation: Does someone know it?
transcript: 有人知道吗？

translation: Let's listen to it again.
transcript: 我们再听一遍。

translation: You said “Legend of White Snake”. What is it?
transcript: “新白娘子传奇”，是什么？

translation: I'll give you a hint if you haven’t got it.
transcript: 对，这是给大家一个提示啊，如果没猜出来的。

translation: It is a beautiful story about Hangzhou, and I read this story many times while I was a child.
transcript: 就是这个是关于杭州的一个非常美丽的一个故事，而且是看着这个故事我看着这个故事长大的，新白娘子传奇。

translation: Let's listen to another one, "96368 cigarette order platform", can you hear it clearly?
transcript: 咱们再听一个， “96368统一订烟平台”，能听清吗？

translation: "96368 cigarette order platform", again. "96368 cigarette order platform".
transcript: “96368统一订烟平台”，再来一遍，“96368统一订烟平台”，

translation: So it is obvious that it is hard for us to figure out what the speaker is saying.
transcript: 可以看到我们很难分辨出这个声音，他说的是这个。

translation: OK,  let's look at an example of long speech recognition.
transcript: OK，这是语音的识别，我们再来看一看长语音识别的一个示例。

translation: Welcome to Baidu Create 2018, I'm very glad to give you a demonstration of Baidu's voice technology.
transcript: 欢迎大家来到AI开发者大会，很高兴为大家做百度语音技术的演示。

translation: Our voice technology ranges from voice recognition, voice wake-up and voice synthesis to other technologies.
transcript: 我们的语音技术主要包括：语音识别、语音唤醒、语音合成等技术。

translation: Our ability to recognize long speech is also outstanding.
transcript: 长语音识别的能力也比较突出，

translation: What I'm saying now can be recognized in real time.
transcript: 比如，我现在说的话就可以被同步识别。

translation: Besides, whisper can be recognized, too.
transcript: 另外，小声说话也能够被识别。

translation: I am in a meeting now, I will call you back later.
transcript: 我现在正在开会，开完会后给你电话。

translation: It can even recognize singing.
transcript: 甚至，连歌声都可以被识别，

translation: Let's listen to a short piece of The Road to Ordinary.
transcript: 下面给大家唱一段《平凡之路》：

translation: I’ve crossed mountains and oceans, and wandered through crowds.
transcript: 我曾经跨过山和大海，也穿过人山人海。

translation: Everything I once had faded away in the blink of an eye.
transcript: 我曾经拥有着的一切，转眼都飘散如烟。

translation: I was once frustrated and disappointed, lost all direction, until I saw that the only answer lies in the road to ordinary.
transcript: 我曾经失落、失望、失掉所有方向，直到看见平凡才是唯一的答案。

translation: It is a classic song.
transcript: 这歌非常经典。

translation: Then let’s talk about basic technologies of language processing.
transcript: 好，再有就是语言处理的基础技术。

translation: Based on its sophisticated fundamental technologies, Baidu has opened the operators of technologies including basic lexical analysis, syntactic analysis, word vector, language model, semantic similarity between words, similarity between short text, comment and opinion extraction, and sentiment analysis and classification.
transcript: 百度把它基于呃沉淀的这种雄厚的基础技术，这种基础的词法分析、句法分析、词向量、语言模型、词义相似度、短文本相似度、评论观点抽取、情感倾向分析通通地开放出来这些技术的算子。

translation: Baidu UNIT is the most advanced platform in China for chatbot training and development.
transcript: 再有就是UNIT，我们最领先的机器人对话训练和开发平台。

translation: Its capabilities consist of four aspects.
transcript: 它具有四个方向的能力。

translation: First, the understanding of needs, which means it can fully understand your intentions.
transcript: 一是需求理解，它可以充分地理解你的意图。

translation: Second, this platform provides dialogue management and flexible configuration.
transcript: 再一个利用这个平台你可以提供对话的管理和灵活的配置，

translation: It means that you can configure the dialog logic including what to say first.
transcript: 就包括先说什么再说什么，这种对话逻辑，是完全可以配置的。

translation: Third, it can quickly customize dialog units, including your domain of knowledge and Q&A knowledge, all of which can be customized here.
transcript: 再有就是快速地定制对话单元，包括你的领域知识，你自己的领域知识和问答知识，都可以在这里面自自定义，嗯。

translation: The last one is a mechanism of sustainable optimization. Through this platform, we can continuously optimize our models and products, so as to provide a better experience.
transcript: 再有就是可持续的优化机制，通过这个机这个呃平台，我们可以不断地打磨我们的模型、产品，能够就是提供更好的一个体验。

translation: It can be applied in many fields.
transcript: 它在各个领域，

translation: For example, this is our developer, please play the video.
transcript: 比如说，这是我们的开发者，放一下视频。

translation: What ingredients would you like to use?
transcript: 您想用什么食材呢？

translation: We have selected the following recipes for you.
transcript: 我们筛选出了下面这些菜谱。

translation: Sole fish.
transcript: 龙利鱼。

translation: How long do you plan to cook this meal?
transcript: 您想花费多少时间做饭？

translation: We have selected the following recipes for you.
transcript: 我们筛选出了下面这些菜谱。

translation: Half an hour.
transcript: 半个小时吧。

translation: You would like to cook...
transcript: 您希望做菜…

translation: Because she did spend half an hour cooking, so that part is cut out from the video.
transcript: 因为她真做了半个小时，所以这里面就给剪辑了。

translation: It's done.
transcript: 准备好了。

translation: The third step is to cut the sole fish into small pieces, and marinate them with two spoons of cooking wine, a little black pepper and salt for 20 minutes.
transcript: 第三步是龙利鱼切小块，用两勺料酒，一点黑胡椒和盐腌制20分钟。

translation: Wait for 10 minutes.
transcript: 等我十分钟。

translation: We will remind you in ten minutes.
transcript: 我们将会在十分钟后提示您。

translation: Let's stop here.
transcript: 好，我们就放到这儿了。

translation: Such a complicated cooking process can be created with UNIT, let alone the customer support in a retail scenario, right?
transcript: 就是如此复杂的做菜的一个过程，都可以用UNIT来打造出来，更别说是零售场景的这种客服的支持了，对吧？

translation: It is also the fact.
transcript: 事实也是如此，

translation: The customer service robot we made by UNIT for Du Xiaoman's customer service center can solve more than 80% of the problems, it greatly improved the efficiency of customer service.
transcript: 我们用UINT帮助百度金融客服中心打造的这个客服机器人能够解决80%以上的问题，大大提高了这种客服的效率。

translation: Next let's talk about the solution for Baidu robot, it is a combination of software and hardware.
transcript: 好，下面是这个百度机器人机器人的解决方案，它是一个软硬综合一体的方案。

translation: It has several capabilities.
transcript: 它包括几个能力，

translation: The first is visual inertial SLAM.
transcript: 一个是视觉惯性SLAM，

translation: Second, relocation.
transcript: 再一个是重定位，

translation: Third, the design of open source hardware.
transcript: 还有开源这种硬件的设计，

translation: Then there are depth map and the detection of obstacles as well as objects in scenes, etc.
transcript: 再一个是深度图和障碍物的检测、场景物体的检测等等。

translation: Let’s watch an introduction video of this platform.
transcript: 下面通过一段视频我们来大体了解一下这个平台。

translation: Baidu Open Robot Vision Platform provides an integrated solution combining software and hardware.
transcript: 百度机器人视觉开放平台，提供软硬一体的解决方案，

translation: The open-source hardware module consists of a binocular camera and an inertial sensor.
transcript: 开源的硬件模组由双目相机和惯性传感器构成。

translation: The robot SLAM adopts a binocular visual inertial algorithm, and the positioning result features short delays and small errors.
transcript: 机器人SLAM，采用双目视觉惯性算法，定位结果延迟小、误差低。

translation: SLAM is optimized for robots and can cover a wide range of complex scenarios.
transcript: SLAM针对机器人优化，可以覆盖大范围的复杂场景。

translation: When receiving images, the binocular camera obtains accurate and complete information of the obstacle through deep neural network.
transcript: 双目摄像头获取图像经过深度神经网络得到准确完整的障碍物信息。

translation: The map-building algorithm uses the positioning system of SLAM to splice obstacles and then obtain a two-dimensional map, which helps the robot walk around  independently.
transcript: 地图建立算法利用SLAM的定位对障碍物进行拼接，得到平面二维地图，帮助机器人在环境中自主地行走。

translation: The solution of robotic vision is connected to Baidu Cloud API.
transcript: 机器人视觉解决方案，连接百度云端API，

translation: With face recognition technology, it can quickly and accurately find the current user's information in a database of up to tens of thousands of people.
transcript: 人脸识别可以在多至数万人的数据库中，快速准确地找出当前用户的信息。

translation: Object recognition can identify various commodities and objects, while OCR is used for text recognition.
transcript: 物体识别可以识别出各种商品和物体，OCR可以进行文字识别。

translation: Baidu's open robot vision open platform allows the machine to understand the world as human does.
transcript: 百度机器人视觉开放平台，让机器像人一样看懂世界。

translation: Imagine how efficient the distribution and delivery will be if such capability is integrated into our logistics robots.
transcript: 可以想象如果我们的物流机器人能够具备这样都具备这样的能力的话，我们的配送和这个配货这个环节会有多么的高效。

translation: Okay, there are more AI-infused capabilities and open platforms.
transcript: 好，还有更多这个AI的能力，以及开放的平台。

translation: They include AR platform.
transcript: 比如说，AR的平台啊等等，

translation: I won’t go into details here.
transcript: 我就不在这里做详细的展开了。

translation: Later, my co-worker Ma Xiaoxin will introduce the capabilities of AR.
transcript: 一会儿我的同事马晓昕也会介绍一些AR方面的知识和技能。

translation: In addition to these capabilities that we have opened, we also offer complete service and provide the best  environment for development, learning and communication, including some development kits, as well as supports from the developer community, where developers can discuss their their works and exchange ideas.
transcript: 好，除了这些这些我们以上开放的能力，我们还全面的服务，提供最优质的开发和学习交流环境，包括一些开发套件，以及开发者社区的一些支持，开发者可以把他们的作品和问题在这里充分地交流。

translation: If our developers have any questions, they can ask us or make requests through our official website portal or mobile portal. We may also talk about cooperation.
transcript: 如果有以上有任何的问题呢，我们开发者也还可以通过我们的官网入口和这种咨询移动端咨询的入口来对我们提问或者提需求都可以，或者是谈合作。

translation: Okay, we know very well that some of the capabilities we have opened and the work we have done are far from enough, so we launched Baidu AI Ecosystem Partner Program, hoping that our efforts could encourage our developers and partners to make greater achievements in implementing AI technologies.
transcript: 好，我们深知道，我们刚才开放了的一些能力以及做的所有的工作还远远不够，所以我们发布了百度AI生态伙伴计划，我们希望用我们的星火之力，能够帮助开发者和合作伙伴形成AI落地的燎原之势，

translation: This is our Liaoyuan Program .
transcript: 这就是我们的燎原计划。

translation: Let me explain.
transcript: 我为大家解读一下。

translation: What does Baidu Ecosystem Partner Program, namely Liaoyuan Program, mean?
transcript: 首先，生态伙伴计划——燎原计划是指什么呢？

translation: It means providing resources at multiple layers, such as in technology, customers, marketing, business operations and investment support to companies in the AI field, helping partners succeed in their business and sharing a AI-themed future.
transcript: 是面向AI领域相关公司，输出技术、客户、营销、企业运作和投资支持等多个层面的资源，帮助伙伴成功，共享AI未来。

translation: Yes, if you become a Baidu AI ecosystem partner, you will be supported in terms of technology, clients and marketing resources.
transcript: 对，如果成为这个百度AI生态伙伴，能够获得技术、客户、营销资源的支持。

translation: Meanwhile, we will choose some of our best partners to take part in our AI accelerator.
transcript: 同时，我们在伙伴中会择优选择一些进入我们的AI 加速器。

translation: In the accelerator, you can take courses on business operation and receive investment.
transcript: 我们在加速器中，能够享受企业运作课程、投资等方面的支持。

translation: So who can become our ecosystem partners?
transcript: 那谁可以成为生态伙伴呢？

translation: First, solution providers.
transcript: 首先是解决方案商。

translation: They integrate Baidu's AI technology with its own product and services to serve specific markets or mid-end users, SI or ISV.
transcript: 将百度的AI技术与其自身产品服务相结合后，服务于特定市场或中端用户的企业，SI或ISV。

translation: Second, the industrial chain manufacturers.
transcript: 再一个就是产业链厂商，

translation: They are our hardware partners who have integrated Baidu’s AI technology in their products, and the software or hardware manufacturers who help implement our AI technology.
transcript: 融合了百度AI技术的硬件合作伙伴，或在AI技术落地环节中起到助力作用的软硬件厂商。

translation: Then the ecosystem partners are divided into three levels of stars, namely one-, two- and three-star.
transcript: 然后生态伙伴分为一、二、三，三个星级，

translation: The level is measured from dimensions such as registered capital and developers.
transcript: 从这个注册资金、开发人员等等这个维度去衡量。

translation: Partners on different levels enjoy different rights and interests
transcript: 而这三个层级呢，又有不同的权益。

translation: Mainly in three aspects.
transcript: 主要是三个方面：

translation: First, technological resources.
transcript: 一个是技术资源方面，

translation: Our technological resources involve free access to AI services, a priority over product beta testing, regular training and learning, and invitation to events like our ecosystem partner program.
transcript: 我们的技术资源能够提供AI服务免费的调用量，还有内测产品的优先使用权，定期的培训与学习，受邀生态合作伙伴的这种活动。

translation: Second, joint branding.
transcript: 再一个就是品牌共建，

translation: They are authorized to use Baidu's AI brand, the exclusive promotion channel of Baidu's AI, and joint BTL events of Baidu's AI.
transcript: 授权使用百度AI品牌，百度AI专有的渠道宣传，再有百度AI线下活动联合的展现。

translation: Third, customer sharing.
transcript: 第三就是客户的共享，

translation: We are certainly far from achieving the ideal goal of our AI era with our own efforts, so we must share potential clients so as to implement AI together with our partners.
transcript: 因为凭借我们一己之力，肯定远远无法实现我们人工智能时代最理想的目标，我们就要共享这个潜在的客户，一同去进行AI的落地。

translation: Also, we can give them the priority to customize their needs.
transcript: 再一个就是制定定制化的需求，我们可以优先的满足。

translation: In addition, their product services can be placed on our platform and we are responsible for the publicity and promotion.
transcript: 第三就是产品服务可以入驻我们的平台，我们负责给宣布宣传和推广。

translation: Moreover, we give our partners the priority of joining the accelerator that provides the following core resources.
transcript: 然后，对于合作伙伴我们要优先选择进入加速器，能提供以下核心资源。

translation: First, courses customized by top instructors.
transcript: 首先是顶级导师定制课程，

translation: We have top-level instructors in areas such as technology, products, entrepreneurship and investment.
transcript: 我们提供技术、产品、创业、投资方面的顶级导师，

translation: There will be a three-month intensive course and offline customized guide, and we have completed the curriculum design.
transcript: 为期三个月的集中课程和线下定制化的指导，这个课程我们已经完成了。

translation: Second, our ecosystem partner can enjoy the priviledge of the three-star level.
transcript: 再一个就是生态伙伴，能够享受三星权益。

translation: The third is Baidu Investment.
transcript: 第三个就是百度投资，

translation: If you buy our shares and your program is highly in line with Baidu's business, you can obtain Baidu's cash and technology investment.
transcript: 入股公司，和百度协同业务协同度较高的这个项目，会得到百度的投资以现金或技术入股。

translation: Other high-quality programs will win the attention of investment institutions such as Baidu Ventures.
transcript: 其他的优质项目会得到百度风投及多个投资机构的这个关注。

translation: Third, technological support.
transcript: 再有就是技术支持，

translation: For the projects in the accelerator, Baidu can deploy the AI technological engineers and solution teams to work for the projects, so as to support their customization and implementation.
transcript: 针对加速器内的项目，百度可面向可可定向协调AI技术工程师，还有解决方案团队，支持定制化和项目落地。

translation: Our registration started last month, and it ends on November 17th.
transcript: 而我们这个报名，已经在上个月就开始了，而截止日期是在11月17号，

translation: You may want to consider scanning the code to register before the due date.
transcript: 大家要抓紧最后的时间，赶紧扫码报名。

translation: Of course, please refer to the following website for details. If you have any questions, you can also contact us via email.
transcript: 当然，详情可以参见下面的网址，以及有任何问题也可以发这个邮件，

translation: My co-workers from Baidu investment division are here too, you can have a talk or consult with them after this presentation.
transcript: 包括会后我们后边还有我们百度投资的相关的同事在在会场，大家可以充分地进行交流和和业务的咨询。

translation: We hope to build the most open, well-rounded and fairest technological ecosystem in 2018.
transcript: 好，我们的初衷和目的就是打造最开放、最平等、最贴心的AI技术生态。

translation: In 2018, we will work with 500 ecosystem partners, train 5,000 engineers specializing in deep learning, select 60 start-ups into our accelerators, and invest in 10 AI start-ups.
transcript: 在2018年我们将携手500家生态合作伙伴，培养5000位深度学习工程师，遴选60家创业公司进入加速器，而且投资10家AI的创业公司。

translation: Finally, I’d like to say that the trend of AI is not a gust of wind but a torrent.
transcript: 最后我想说，AI不是风口，AI是洪流。

translation: I hope that our open platform and Liaoyuan Program can really help our developers and partners improve their ideas and products, tackle technological hardship, and advance in their business!
transcript: 希望我们的开放平台，还有燎原计划，能够真心地帮助我们的开发者和合作伙伴，能够帮助他们的创意和产品，在洪流中乘风破浪，激流勇进！

translation: OK, thank you!
transcript: 好，谢谢大家！
